startPage.welcomeMessage: Lumi's Analytics tool lets you import user reports and visualizes them for you

error.econnrefused: Could not contact Lumi Auth server. Please check your internet connection.
error.no-valid-email: {{email}} is not a valid email address.

notification.pending: A verification code has been send to {{email}}. Please check your emails.

bug_report.consent: I allow this application to send bug & crash reports.
bug_report.description: Help us improve our software and services by sending anonymous crash & bug reports.

email.body:
To get a quick solution for your problem, please write about:

  - Lumi version: <fill in here>, Operating system: <fill in here>
  - describe the problem
  - describe how we can reproduce the problem on our machines
  - send us sample .h5p or exported files if the problem is related to the files

If you send us messages in a language other than English or German, we will use an auto-translation tool to translate your message.
email.subject: Lumi problem report

bug_report.title: Bug & Crash Reports

format.bundleHint: The file can grow too big for some computers if you include lots of media files.
format.externalHint: You will be asked for a name for the HTML file in the next step. The media files will be put into folders that start with the same name as the file.
format.externalLabel: One HTML file and several media files
format.title: Format

setup_dialog.consent_warning: You need to at least consent to the privacy policy to use this application.
setup_dialog.description: Protecting the individual's privacy is important for us. We only collect the information you choose to give us, and we process it with your consent. We want to be as transparent as possible. However Lumi relies on some connections and data transfers to work.
